item.title: BP doesn’t wait for new CEO to take big write-off of renewables business
item.description: BP isn’t even waiting for its new CEO to start before taking a big charge over its push into renewable energy.

item.title: ‘I’m considering driving Lyft part time’: I’m 58 with a $1 million home. Do I finally give up work and enjoy life?
item.description: “One thought is for me to stop working at age 60, while my wife continues for two more years at her teaching job.”

item.title: Billionaire Google co-founder Larry Page shells out $173 million on Miami mansions
item.description: Page purchased two opulent homes in the tony Miami enclave of Coconut Grove, reports say.

item.title: China’s record trade surplus is as big as the GDP of most countries
item.description: China was able to offset a slump in exports to the U.S. by redirecting them to Africa, India, Europe and Southeast Asian countries.
